isis.stitle: CAB: 2000, 4000, AND 8000 - REMOVE AND INSTALL - WINDSHIELD WIPERS (ELECTRIC MOTOR)

svcprocinfo.para: The windshield wiper system consists of a single unitized 12 volt electric motor that operates the wiper arms through linkage ( Figure 48).
Since the wiper motor is of unitized construction, there is no need for motor rebuild or adjustments. There are no serviceable parts; the complete assembly is replaced.

caution.para: Do not attempt to move the blades through their sweep by grasping the wiper arm. This action may result in the teeth being broken off the drive gear or the linkage bent. If blades are frozen to windshield, do not operate control switch until they have been freed.

svcsubproc.title: Remove Wiper Motor

step1.para: With ignition key in ON position, cycle wiper arm to the end of the sweep cycle (wiper blade by left side of windshield). Turn key to OFF position.
Unlatch hood on both sides and tilt hood to fully open position.
Disconnect wiper motor wiring harness at connection.
Remove clamp securing wiring harness to cowl mounting bracket.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 48) for Items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.

step1.para: Through cowl opening, using a small screwdriver, remove snap clip retaining wiper linkage. (Item 6) to motor drive arm (Item 8).
Remove bolts (Item 6, Figure 49) securing wiper motor/mounting bracket (Items 5 and 7, Figure 49) to cowl and remove mounting bracket and motor together as an assembly.

figure.caption: Figure 49. Wiper Motor and Mounting Assembly

svcsubproc.para: Remove retaining nut (Item 7) securing drive arm (Item 8) to motor (Item 4). Remove drive arm and washer (Items 8 and 9). Note position of arm for installation.

svcsubproc.title: Install Wiper Motor
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 48for Items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.

step1.para: Place drive arm and washer (Items 8 and 9) on motor (Item 4) and secure with retaining nut (Item 7).
Position wiper motor/mounting bracket (Items 5 and 7, Figure 49) on cowl and secure with bolts (Item 6, Figure 49).
Secure wiper linkage (Item 6) to motor drive arm (Item 8).
Secure motor wiring harness with clamp to cowl at the mounting bracket.
Connect wiper motor wiring harness at connector.
Lower hood and latch hood on both sides.
